full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DNGOS PO BRGYAD DON BDUN CU'I RNAM BZHAG BLO LDAN RE SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(CES BSTAN BCOS MNGON RTOGS RGYAN GYI BSDUS DON BLO LDAN RE SKONG ZHES BYA BA, 'JAM DBYANGS DGA' BLO DANG, PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA, KUN MKHYEN NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO LNGA PA GSUM GYI GSUNG GI DGONGS DO GTZO BOR BZUNG STE, DNGOS PO BRGYAD DON BDUN CU'I RGANG GRANGS MTSAN NYID DBYEB MTSAMS GSUM GSUMG YI SGO NAS MDOR BSDUS PA 'DI YANG DGE SBYONG GI GZUGS BRNYAN CAN BLO GLING DGE BSHES BLO BZANG TSE RING GI MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO 'DREN MCHOG SH'AKYA'I TOG ,RGYAL TSAB MI PHAM MGON DANG THOGS MED ZHABS, RGYALBA GNYIS PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA @017B SOGS, RGYAL BA'I GDUNG TSOB BLA MA RNAMS LA 'DUD, ,RGYAL YUM DGONGS DON DNGOS BRGYAD DON BDUN CU'I, RNAM GZHAG 'DI YANG 'JAM DBYANGS DGA' BLO DANG, ,PAn CHEN BSOD GRAGS DGONGS PA JI BZHIN DU, ,DRAN DBANG MTSO 'BYUNG DGYES PA'I LANG TSOS BSGRIGS, TSAD LDAN LEGS BSHAD DAM PA'I KHUNGS BRAL BA'I, ,'OL TSOD DRIMS PA SLAD PA 'DIL MED, DE PHYIR GZUR GNAS CHOS LA YID RTON PA'I, ,BLO GSAL DON GNYER TSOGS KYIS DGA' STON MDZOD, ,TSUL 'DI KHU RE KUN DGA' CHOS GLIN GI ,BLO RIG 'DZIN GRVA PA RNAMS PAR DU BSGRUBS, , DGE BAS RGYAL BSTAN 'PHEL RGYAS YUN RING DU, GNAS SHING ^ DAM PA'I MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS GYUR CIG , 'DI YANG SKYOR DPON NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA SOGS, 'DZIN GRVA MANG NAS DGOS TSUL MOL BA LTAR, , @018A *, ,DAM PA'I ZHABS RDUL BSTEN PA'I RAB 'BYAMS PA, NGAG GI DBANG POS BRIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
